review_data.title: Un vero Pub
review_data.content: Consigliato per chi vuole respirare l'ambiente di un vero pub. Birre, servizio inglese e cortesia. Vi sono varie birre alla...More

review_data.title: Good effort with the English pub decor!
review_data.content: This is one of our locals and it seemed a shame not to try the English pub in the area. We wouldn't have gone in otherwise as it is totally uninviting from the outside with a weird pink artex kind of facade that makes it...More

review_data.title: Only had Beer
review_data.content: I like this place, Happy hour between 4-6 in the week and boy do you need that in Zurich. Bar staff were great and the beers is very good. I did eat here if you are looking for a Local Pun in the Oerlikon area...More

review_data.title: Simon says...
review_data.content: Popped in here a few times after work whilst on a recent visit to Zurich. It's a big L shaped bar with darts and foosball at one end and seated area the other. Very good, friendly and helpful staff. Simon (the owner) made an appearance...More

review_data.title: Rough around the edges but good service and good beer
review_data.content: A little rough diamond. Deceptive from the outside as it's very spacious and nicely decked out compared to the bland exterior. Simon loves what he does and makes you feel welcome Can get absolutely rammed if there's an Ice Hockey game on so pick your...More

review_data.title: Buen pub
review_data.content: Un buen pub en la ciudad, comodo, con buen ambiente y buenos tragos. Ademas, hay muchas opciones de cervezas. La...More

review_data.title: Very nice pub
review_data.content: Pub with great atmosphere, lovely bartenders and a great selection of beers and ciders. There is also the possibility to play darts or table soccer. The music is well chosen, not too loud and on nice days you can sit outside.

review_data.title: Good choice of beer, friendly service, prices ok.
review_data.content: I dropped in for a quick drink and dinner whilst on business and staying in a nearby hotel. The food menu is very small - a few things like burgers etc - so the pub was not an ideal choice for my needs. However, the...More

review_data.title: Nice, friendly, old bar in Oerlikon
review_data.content: S. ip’s bar is located down from the Oerlikon train station tracks. The building is rather old and the exterior is not that great. The sidewalk tables and chair are of the plastic variety. Inside, it’s mostly wooden tables and chairs and at the back...More

review_data.title: English pub in Oerlikon
review_data.content: I have seen this place for years from the train and wondered what it was like. Good selection of beers, friendly staff. Great international crowd.
